title: Never been banned/chat restricted AMA
body: never been banned on any game or muted by a moderator on any game. I have never broken a league rule and I am one of the best league players on the oceanic community. I was never banned on habbo/club penguin. Never on runescape or anything. AMA

replies.body: Have you gotten banned on Town of Salem? i Have.
Never heard of it. Never been banned.
Do you have an honour ribbon?
i'm not sure if you're trying to brag or what, but to be honest this was a waste of a post and i thought i'd let you know.
thats a waste of a reply. Thought i'd let you know. Nice try guy.
so what was the point of the post then?
Have you ever been banned or chat restricted?
Have you ever played Habbo Hotel, Club Penguin or Runescape?
I played rs for like 3 years. Play habbo hotel once, Never played CP.
Haven't played Club Penguin? But that is like the introductory MOBA! How can you understand LoL mechanics without that prior Club Penguin knowledge?
